website_summaries.verdict: While the price should be about a third lower, Klipsch's Groove mini Bluetooth speaker is well designed and packs a punch.
pros: The Klipsch Groove is a compact, durable mini Bluetooth speaker that's splashproof and sounds good for its size, with a 3-inch driver and two passive bass radiators
cons: a bit too heavy for easy travel

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Spectacular...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Klipsch Heresy speakers in the mid 1970's. They are hands down some of the very best speakers on the planet. The Groove is no exception. It sounds absolutely magnificent. It packs a wallop on the clear and crisp lows. The higher end of the spectrum is better than OK although it could stand a bit beefing up. I hooked my iPod 160GB classic to my new Groove and it sounds spectacular. It's small in stature but kind of heavy. I'm very happy with my new purchase and would not hesitate recommending it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: great sound, small package
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/11/19 - The speaker is still going strong and I still love it! This speaker packs a lot of sound into a little package. The highs are crisp and clear, the midrange isn't muddy - the only possible complaint is that the bass isn't really heavy, which you shouldn't really expect for a small portable speaker. It's nice and sturdy, holds a charge a good long time, and sounds great. I bounce the speaker back and forth between my home office (where it's played very clearly at low volumes) and my kitchen (*turns to 11*). Sounds awesome in both places, at all volumes. I LOVE this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Astounding service from 1shop direct. Ordered on weekend got it Monday. The device is equally outstanding. I’ve always wanted a pair of klipsch horns but not only won’t drop 10k on them but don’t have the room. So this was sort of my klipsch bucket list purchase. Bought one for my wife since her oontz angle broke. A few $$ more but god what a difference. She linked hers to Bluetooth in the next room and I couldn’t believe the fullness and quality of sound. The oontz is a nice portable device but it’s not in the same league. The Groove reminds me of the astonishing sound from dynamic speakers the first time I heard Bose901’s back in the 70’s.
customer_reviews.author: J. M Ullman

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch kills it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great sounding little Bluetooth speaker. Have been a high end audiophile for years and have several klipsch speakers. I used to sell their line at a local audio video store years ago. So When deciding on what small speaker to buy, I put my faith in Klipsch, as I always have, and it does not disappoint.... for the size, 4”x4”, you get a nice full sound, extremely clear. This speaker has some weight to it, knowing it’s well made, I know it will last. Please keep in mind, it’s a small speaker, so don’t expect big booming bass, not going to happen with this category of speakers. A definite recommendation to anyone looking for this size of speaker...
customer_reviews.author: Mr Buka

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great! Seems well made. Only thing that might be an issue is that while this is a rechargable Bluetooth speaker, that would make most people assume this speaker is very portable. It is definitely portable, but it does have a bit of weight to it and that might not be as good for some. Especially backpackers that need to think of both weight and size for their packs. Id look elsewhere if that is what you are concerned with. Otherwise, this is going to be a nice shelf speaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kanoa K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just damn impressive. Needed something for the patio/yard and MAC compatible. Excellent quality and solidly built. The Bluetooth range is greater than 45'. The audio quality is more than acceptable. And the setup is VERY easy. Looked at and heard several competitive products without money being an issue and this system won by leaps and bounds. Have had it in use for a couple of months and have had no issues. Use it every day. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: D@mn fine little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds awesome! I use this at my diesel shop everyday. Fully cranked I can get almost all 8 hours out of it. The sound in the shop is loud and clear. But when I use it at home it really shines. The bass is deep and rich. Music is almost crystal clear. And at $100 you're hard pressed to find better sound. The speaker is hefty. Feels very solid. Has a nice rubber band going around it to stop it from sliding. Pairing is quick and easy after the first time. I turn it on and within about 10 seconds it's paired itself to my phone. I strongly recommend this speaker to anyone looking for good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Hex

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Maybe at $150 it’s not great. Now, compared to other speakers in the low to mid range, this is a killer speaker. It’s loud, but not distorted. The sound is above average especially compared to the no name brands at this price... and I’ve tried a bunch of those. The build quality here is also top rate. It sounds similar to my JBL Charge 3, but that speaker is still better. It is also 3 times the cost. Keep your expectations in check.
customer_reviews.author: summithome

customer_reviews.title: Its a Klipsch by name only
customer_reviews.text: Growing up I had heard Klipsch Cornerhorns and Cornwalls...My God they rocked my world. But $2500+ each put them out of my league. Fast forward 40 years I find a Klipsch blue tooth speaker for $70. It was shipped to my workplace and everyone was a buzz. Big Disappointment. Average at best. Nothing special. In fact my Altec Lansing Lifejacket sounds better and has a more purer richer sound. But what the hell...I finally own a Klipsch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable mono speaker
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a true audiophile, this is a great little speaker, as long as you can appreciate mono, which you should since even "stereo" Bluetooth speakers provide, unless you buy two, pair them and separate them significantly. Only two drawbacks with this speaker; it cannot be paired with a twin to create stereo sound, and it is heavy, as any quality speaker should be!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: How Can a Speaker Have a Short-Attention Span?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: • Under $100 • Easy to pack for travel • Solid sound for the price • Decent battery life Cons: Shuts off after five minutes if you play nothing. This might seem like a small nuisance but after the fourth time in one day, I almost want to drop it from my penthouse balcony. Had I known this prior I would have passed and bought a different speaker. Indeed this feature is what ultimately led me to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: 33yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and attractive - 5 stars-except.......
customer_reviews.text: Four and not 5 stars only because the control buttons are very hard to see and impossible to see at night. No back lights for pause and volumes, and the others come on only when you've found them and used them - not to help you find them. Attractive but difficult to use. But if you want great sound for the size and money you won't beat this speaker. Love it except hard to see volume and other controls. It's still one of my all-time favorites.
customer_reviews.author: RickRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Planned obsolescence
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for such a contact unit. However less than a year in use and the plug in area caved in while plugging in and never took another charge. Subpar adhesive or job applying it? Wish I could get my money back, something like this from a quality company like Klipsch should last a minimum of five years, if not decades. I didn't buy some cheap no name brand for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Zed Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bluetooth speaker. I`m in my sixties and never thought I would ever purchase one. But because I love music and like it louder then most my age I had to get one rather then use the old dock style speaker. I was looking at Amazons "Deal of the day" and spotted this Klipsch Groove. I knew Klipsch has a great reputation. This has great sound and volume. I'm very pleased with it. It would be a great purchase and the full price but I'm glad I found it on sale. I have to say that Amazon has never failed to satisfy me when purchasing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although I’ve had this well over a year (which isn’t long esp considering how much it cost and how often I use it), I have to push the buttons several times to get it to work, connect to bluetooth or even come on. This was extremely disappointing as I would expect a Klipsch product to last a very long time. I’ll have to purchase something else because I need something I can depend on. This isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value at $58...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! For $55 it sounds way better than any speaker at this price: crisp and very clear. It's got a nice bass response up to about my phone's 80% of total bluetooth volume and speaker's volume 100%. Definately Klipsch 's signature sound. Also, I'm inclined to believe that this particular speaker was designed to be heard at a distance of at least a few feet, at minimum. Recommendation: buy, and you will not be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: JoFi

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly rich, nuanced sound for a relatively small, inexpensive speaker. Easy sync, etc. Impressed, overall. The only problem: when it’s powered on/ready to receive signal, it emits a couple of extremely loud rock electric guitar chords. A gentler loud electric strummed chord when powering down. Completely obtrusive and annoying; no doubt a nod to what Klipsch considers to be its target audience: the young, on-the-go, ‘Xtreme—to the MAX!!’ crowd. I would have expected more class from a venerated outfit like Klipsch.
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: Quite the sleeper in bluetooth speaker tech
customer_reviews.text: For such a diminutive sized speaker, this unit packs a whallop of sound. I personally like the heft of the groove, makes it feel substantial rather than some tinny box. Paired up quickly with my phone and hasn't missed a beat yet. Comes packaged with an a/c adapter and offers a line-level output. I haven't tested it's splash proof worthiness, but with it's rating I'm sure that's a non-issue. Would've given it five stars but for the lack of it's inability to receive calls. It does mute the audio for incoming calls. All in all, a real winner if you're looking for quality sound with some thump to it. Highly recommended 👍
customer_reviews.author: john baker

customer_reviews.title: surprising bass in this little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: the speaker is solid. great sound at high volume. depending on where you place it can really can bring out the bass. the speaker is quite heavy for it size which speaks quality material to me. my only gripe is it shuts off rather quickly if not using. (ex. if i get a phone call i have to turn it back on and reconnect) it also turns itself down, so you have to readjust the volume each time you turn it on. other than that i am quite pleased. i have ownednit for about 6 months and it still works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Hey You

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, but had trouble turning the unit on
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, but had trouble turning the unit on! Even on a full charge, more times than not, when I attempt to switch the unit on; it shuts off within a few seconds. If I connect the AC adapter, then it stays on most of the time. I have a traditional pair of Klipsch (wired) speakers and they work very well and the sound quality is excellent (to an amateur like Yours Truly). So this was an unpleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Munther Louis Antoun

customer_reviews.title: Five stars, and more if i could!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more than five stars, I would! This sweet little baby Klipsch rocks, and it does so with authority! I've always been a Klipsch fan, and I own a pair of industrial LaScalas and a pair of industrial Heresys. This little beast takes the impeccable Klipsch sound quality out onto the patio, or into the garden. I love, Love, LOVE my Klipsch speakers!! Bye, bye, Bose!
customer_reviews.author: Hook 'em DanO

customer_reviews.title: Big sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Sounds better than I expected with good bass for such a small package. Easy to connect Bluetooth and set up, took just a minute. Takes a while to charge but the battery life has been good. I haven't tested the full battery life but I've gotten 4 hours of continuous play with no issues. I've only owned it for a couple of weeks but I am happy with it. An awesome value at less than $80. A travel case would be nice but I did not see one available.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Suess

customer_reviews.title: Great BT Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sounding speaker! Very impressed with this speaker considering it's size. While it's not the best bluetooth speaker for portability, it makes a great "round the house" speaker with plenty of volume for that purpose. I usually bring it to the kitchen when cooking. Last Sunday morning, we listened to Sarah Vaughan while I cooked breakfast. It is omnidirectional, if you lay it on it's back. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice portable sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has the best sound of any I've tried in this price range. The range seems very wide with deep rich bass as well as clear crisp high end sounds. It also holds a charge longer than any others I've tried and charges quickly. It's pretty heavy and a little bigger than many "portables", but still fits easily in my suitcase for travel. I'm very pleased and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Basementcleanup

customer_reviews.title: Best Compact /small Bluetooth speaker !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little speaker for camping I’ve heard a few but I didn’t like the sound of most other Bluetooth speakers . I’m definitely impressed sound is well balanced deep clear bass high are crisp with out being too sharp. Don’t misunderstand I didn’t blast it but I did rock it loud enough to fill up the room or Area .Not looking for a nite club speaker on the go. I would recommend this over Bose! Jbl! UE BOOM!! There is a big difference with any music style this little guy rocks awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great for a single driver bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker turned out to be much better than I was expecting. It does better with some types of music than others, but compared to other single driver bluetooth speakers I've used, this thing is pretty great. The suggested price of $150 is more than I would pay, but if you can find it on sale for $100 or less, I would recommend taking the chance on it.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound from such a small unit!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. A lot of crisp loud sound in such a small box! I have an acre sized property and can hear it anywhere outside when I leave it playing on the deck of the house. Bluetooth works fine at considerable distance, but not sure if that's my iPhone doing that or the unit but nice to be able to pull the phone out and change the song or the volume from 50 yards away. Travels well.
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch really did get this one right. I bought this for my son so he can listen to music in his room and I was really impressed considering how much it cost. My son has commented many times about how nice it sounds and how long the battery lasts. I've owned other Bluetooth speakers and for the price, it can't be beat. It is a little heavy for its size, very deceiving but that's just because it is a well built quality item.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Not portable
customer_reviews.text: Not holding a charge, so it is no longer portable.
customer_reviews.author: paula west

customer_reviews.title: The device is pretty heavy, which I attribute to its battery and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Groove speaker met all of my expectations since many factors that indicate quality and materials seem to be there. The device is pretty heavy, which I attribute to its battery and speaker. I also like the enclosure (case) materials which seem substantial and durable. Like many similar units the speaker is not stereophonic but is high fidelity and produces bass without being "boomy." Overall, the Klipsch Groove's sound and construction makes the cost worthwhile to me.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert L.

customer_reviews.title: Its a small square design but heavy so you can feel the Klipsch quality and delivers some pretty decent lows for the size
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong for the money ($69) -Great little speaker. Its a small square design but heavy so you can feel the Klipsch quality and delivers some pretty decent lows for the size. I have the Boze mini II and the Harmon Kardon Onyx Studio which are far more expensive with better sound if you want to pay 2-3 times more, but this a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Dann 14

customer_reviews.title: klipsch quality in small package
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly good for such a small size. gave this one a try and I enjoy taking it around the house when I stream from my phone. my main gripes would be the rubber buttons on top are hard to read and you have to learn by feel which ones do what. also, would love to see klipsch offer some additional size options in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a small speaker! I bought it primarily to use when we're outside with our motorhome. I didn't want to install outdoor speakers on it, so I tried these. I'm a musician, and I've always respected Klipsch, and these did not disappoint. Sound great, plenty of bass, no problems streaming form my android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Frontman1955

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. Surprisingly great sound from such a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Surprisingly great sound from such a small package. Loads of power. It's a bit strong around 100hz, but not annoyingly so. Easy to listen to. I'd buy it again, especially at $49.99 I've owned many Klipsch speakers and headsets, since 1985, KG4s, KG2s, Klipsch earbuds, and ALL are outstanding performers.
customer_reviews.author: Living the dream

customer_reviews.title: Best portable Bluetooth speaker I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many portable Bluetooth speakers before, but this one is the best in sound quality and battery life. I have purchased two and gave one as a gift. I also like the Urge Basics SoundBrick if you want great battery life and pretty good sound quality for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easy to use but controls are hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, easy to use but controls are hard to see and use, the flat black rubber embossed with the symbols for on off, volume and such are really hard to see, we ended up putting labels on the buttons so we could tell them apart. Otherwise its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: E. RHOADS

customer_reviews.title: Your search for a Bluetooth speaker is over!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put.... AMAZING! This speaker delivers an excellent sound. There is another review that states you could use this as your home system and I truly believe that. This speaker fills the room with a wonderful sound and great clarity. I would recommend this to anyone and I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: mjo

customer_reviews.title: Blootooth isn't visable with a lot of devices
customer_reviews.text: The klipsch Bluetooth isn't visable with a lot of blootooth devices. My Dell laptops cannot locate it and my roommate's new LG phone cannot find it. Only my Samsung galaxy s8 can locate it. The speaker is great for the size, sound and price. Very disappointing about the Bluetooth even after I did a factory reset on it. I have a Marshall blootooth speaker that is visable to all of my devices.
customer_reviews.author: kevin armentrout

customer_reviews.title: Kool Klipsch
customer_reviews.text: Been using this speaker for a few days now. The sound quality is much better than expected. The range and depth for vocals, instrumental, bass are all rich sounding. Impressive for this smaller sized speaker. Bluetooth works flawlessly and the buttons on top are useful and convenient. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BikerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Groove does NOT disappoint. This compact speaker kicks “ you know”
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Klipsch customer for twenty five years; Groove does NOT disappoint. This compact speaker kicks “ you know”! Or as I refer to it, “the bomb”. To be honest I wasn’t sure if I would enjoy one of these but I must admit after getting Groove and hearing how great it sounds I am happy I bought one. You will be too, no kidding this speaker is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: drummer510

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money.  Buy other brand. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is only okay. Worst part is that it takes at least 5 to 6 try’s to connect. Very disappointing. I have a Bose that connects effortlessly every time. I use the Bose and this sits in garage. Junk if you ask me. I only gave it a 2 star for the “ok” sound. I got this for 54 dollars in 2018. I would be kissed if I spent 99. Don’t buy this unless cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High and low tones. More then youd expect from its size.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good ' high and low notes. Not the loudest unit. But its louder then some. Battery life is pretty good. But the bluetooth connectivity is horrible. I bought this cause i have a Klipsch home system. I am quite shocked Klipsch didnt put more into the connectivity. Of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Miller

customer_reviews.title: Biggest baddest little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I've been really happy with my Bose mini speaker until I heard a friend's Klipsch Groove. It has the biggest baddest sound and best volume in its size range that I've found. I love this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: D. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker put it in a big room and will surprise the hell out of you. I found that when u connect your iPhone you only get half volume until you turn the speaker all the way up. What a deal for this price and the clarity is fantastic great bass!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher chiras

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for the price
customer_reviews.text: The best word to use to describe this speaker is adequate. I paid 60 bucks for it on amazon. For this price it's a good buy. I'm surpsied Klipsch put their logo on this though. Not typical Klipsch sound quality. Not bad sound... just not Klipsch quality. Not really even Bose quality as harsh as that is to say lol.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great price!
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought one and loved it. I wanted one but, didn't want to spend a ton of money. The sound and base are great. Pairs easily with various Bluetooth devices. Wish the play life lasted longer than 8 hours and wish the volume went a little louder. But, those are really minor. Good sound, greay price
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but not great like the larger Klipsch ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but not great like the larger Klipsch speakers - definitely not like a bose. I'm surprised Klipsch would put its name on something with a sound quality lower than bose - but still, very good price and good sound for the price. A bit heavy in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Lavalchiefs

customer_reviews.title: Battery quality is excellent so far although I can"t see how you can ...
customer_reviews.text: When it hooks up the sound is deep and vibrant. Battery quality is excellent so far although I can"t see how you can change it once it eventually won't hold a recharge any more? Distance for hookup is less than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: 4 gauge Ron

customer_reviews.title: ... Reference Premiere home theatre and was looking for a great sounding portable speaker and this is it
customer_reviews.text: We have the Reference Premiere home theatre and was looking for a great sounding portable speaker and this is it! Hands down Klipsch quality and sound and you can’t beat the price compared to others like Bose. Will probably end up buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. I have a JBL Flip 4
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell but so far so got.. Al little noisy on start up.Good sound. I have a JBL Flip 4.. Klipsch is very solid and sits well.. Flip 4 is round-ish, like a pregnant flashlight.. But both have good solid sound, but slightly different. Klipsch is 1/3 the price, so if cost is an issue.. Go Klipsch.
customer_reviews.author: slickd.

customer_reviews.title: ... speaker is small but the sound quality is absolutely amazing. The voice frequencies as well as the bass ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is small but the sound quality is absolutely amazing. The voice frequencies as well as the bass come across with high fidelity. The volume can go surprisingly high in this speaker despite its small form factor. Klipsch has really designed this small speaker to produce the full range of sounds with no compromises!! The only issue I can think of is the weird sounds it makes when the bluetooth starts scanning or when it connects to a bluetooth sound source. A good buy, worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh

customer_reviews.title: one of the best Bluetooth speakers on the market
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Clear music and sound, long lasting battery, portable, one of the best Bluetooth speakers on the market, cheaper than most speakers Cons: Makes an obnoxious noise when turned on, off, and when Bluetooth connects. Klipsch makes awesome speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months the piece of garbage won't charge don't waste your money on this overpriced piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker, while it sounds ok (not exceptional), will get into a mood where it NEVER turns on. I have had several episodes where, like right now, I just want to listen to music while cooking dinner, and it hasn’t turned on for 30 minutes. Do yourself a favor, and by a Bose speaker that sounds better and WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Garrels

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for $55_$60
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built speaker with decent power to fill a room around 20x15. The highs are pretty good but the bass gets muddy at higher volumes. Controls are simple and Bluetooth connection is very easy
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vittoria

customer_reviews.title: Factory reset when turning on, but sounds fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh I love this and want to give it more stars. Would definitely give it five stars if not for the factory reset every time. I love the way it sounds but not happy with the turning on and pairing. Will stretch to 3 stars because I love the way it sounds. Ok so, 3 Overall. 5 for sound, 2 for the whole process for turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great unit if you have tons of patience.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pain in the butt to connect to. No matter if I’m using my phone, my iPad or my laptop, it takes several tries pair up. Audio quality is decent but I hardly ever used it because of the connection headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Joey C

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great portable speaker, good sound, my only complaint is that it’s a bit cumbersome to pair with my iPad. Most of my other BT speakers will automatically pair with the last device, this requires manual pairing each time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: Good bass response and decent highs. Slightly lacking mid-range. Small and compact but well built. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a Klipsch fan so it was pretty much a no-brainer to purchase this when the price was < $50. There may be better Bluetooth speakers out there but not at this price. Good bass and decent highs but it is slightly off in the mid-range. It does exactly what I wanted. Good battery life. If I want to listen to serious music I’ll power up the big system.
customer_reviews.author: Big Brew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound quality in its price range
customer_reviews.text: It is a small portable speaker but sound quality exceeds its size and I don't find any close competitor in this price range. Good deep bass and sound clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Ahmad Khan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome audible my "Big sound" speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with the overall sound quality and being that im hard of hearing that's what I was looking for in this purchase. It has surpassed the expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but decided to return it in exchange for a KMC1. The one single driver simply did not hack it in terms of sound output
customer_reviews.author: J Dingo

customer_reviews.title: Clear, Clean Sound
customer_reviews.text: Pure sound, with very little distortion at high volumes. The BEST sounding Bluetooth I own, and I have about 15 different speakers! Would be perfect if you could pair 2 together. Hope Klipsch has something new coming since this speaker is about 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Problems with some bluetooth devices and is not so loud as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to enhance the audio quality of my phone and PCs via bluetooth. The Samsung Chromebook 3 does not recognize the device. I wished a louder volume and I found a really expected more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Galmes

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the Cambridge Soundworks I bought two years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Much better than the Cambridge Soundworks I bought two years ago. Limited Bluetooth range, the sound quality is not as good as our Echo. After little use it has stayed in a guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis A. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: This little jewel rocks
customer_reviews.text: Some said this speaker doesn’t sound good. They are wrong and for $49 it is a steal. The more it is played the better it sounds. I guess it just has to be broken in...
customer_reviews.author: WRC

customer_reviews.title: Best Small Bluetooth Speaker Ever
customer_reviews.text: My first Klipsch but not last for sure. Small in size but huge in Sound. Crisp, Clear and Compact. Amazon made delivery to International location within 5 working days is no less than Charter service ;) Love this amazing speaker, even not so geeky person are easily convinced with the sound and volume levels. Value for money and thumbs Up to Klipsch :)
customer_reviews.author: Jitendra Panwar

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: The weight of this little speaker should have told me it was going to sound great...but still I was surprised. My hubby and I like it so much we are getting another one. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: connecting issues
customer_reviews.text: You have to download an equalizer app to get any kind of decent sound quality. After it is paired if you switch from one device to another it takes multiple attempts to get it to connect. I am an avid Klipsch fan
customer_reviews.author: protech.runt

customer_reviews.title: Great value at $50
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very crisp. It does play terribly loudly, but absolutely great sound for a single room. I want es something small and with good sound for the kitchen that wasn’t terribly expensive - this was perfect! I’m getting some for gifts before they sell out!
customer_reviews.author: Luci_loo

customer_reviews.title: Could be louder.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, thought it would be louder. How can I possibly listen to Slayer at this level? Update: I love this thing! The volume issue was solved by using the equalizer in my music app. Giving it the 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: sdmcatee

customer_reviews.title: ... top of our $1400 Bose sound bar because we like it more
customer_reviews.text: This actually sits on top of our $1400 Bose sound bar because we like it more. This thing is incredible. The bass is deep and the music is crisp and clear. Whenever I bring this somewhere, I've always got people asking where I got it. We've bought two more as gifts since getting ours.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for the price
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, i am a klipsch fan anyhow. Pretty powerful for the price, compared to others ive tried. I use this speaker while at work and it will last a 10hr shift.
customer_reviews.author: 5150inAZ

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop it on your foot!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn't like that incoming phone calls don't come over on Bluetooth on the speaker, but other than that, he really likes it. It's a very heavy speaker for its size, but apparently that's because it has a very good magnet..
customer_reviews.author: Shorty Teresa

customer_reviews.title: ... them for the first time - the sound is dull! However
customer_reviews.text: What I thought after opening the box and listening to them for the first time - the sound is dull! However, now after some time of break-in, this thing sounds very pleasant. There is almost no distortion on the highest volume and it's very loud. Also, it's very heavy and built like a tank! For this price, i'm sure you cannot find a better product. Believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Nice for size.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds nice, will not rattle the windows, however. Some people rate a speaker by how loud it is... not the case here. I like nice faithful reproduction of sound at a reasonable level.
customer_reviews.author: hleman

customer_reviews.title: Great audio for price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for a small speaker and aupriaing bass levels for the price of the speaker. Will probably buy another in the future to replace all my other Bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had Hoped
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this speaker..Well built the quality is flawless.. For a speaker of its size it does have some weight to it but the sound makes up for it. One must remember this is a bluetooth speaker that is portable to be played anywhere and not a replacement for a home system. With that being said You really could use it as a main sound system because it is that nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bend, Oregon By Way of NYC

customer_reviews.title: I bought this Klipsch bluetooth speaker and have enjoyed its convenience but more so
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many Klipsch speakers and still do...I bought this Klipsch bluetooth speaker and have enjoyed its convenience but more so, the typical warm and full quality sound from it Highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a reasonable priced speaker of high quality
customer_reviews.author: Moodus

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bluetooth speaker. I have many bluetooth speakers, this one sounds fantastic and has a great battery life. Of course it's Klipsch, so you know the sound will be great (I am a big Klipsch fan) . I love how portable it is. We usually use it for an entire day while we work on our house remodel.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie nickel

customer_reviews.title: it has very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For it's size, it has very good sound quality. If you are looking for a "party speaker" like some reviews state, then find one that is larger because it doesn't project a lot of sound. Overall, I am very happy with it, especially since it was under $75.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Meyers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth after a few months doesn't work. Have to start and restart over and over. Almost never works.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn rinzler

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck $
customer_reviews.text: WOW ! Sounds are loud and great clear highs lows and bass. can't be beat for the price paid. Best bang for your buck sounds as good or better than anything I heard at Best Buys displays
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: one of the best bluetooth speakers I have heard
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds awesome!! I was looking for a bluetooth speaker that I could play in the kitchen and in my garage that would sound like some decent bookshelf speakers, and this thing does just that. Amazing sound and hits highs mids and lows. I was pretty blown away with the loudness and quality of audio that came out of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: curt

customer_reviews.title: Decent value, but annoying quirks
customer_reviews.text: For its price point the sound quality is good, but the speaker makes a really annoying loud guitar sound as it powers on.
customer_reviews.author: staples

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, very easy to pair
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very full and rich. I liked it so much I bought one for a friend and he takes it everywhere....he even uses it in his golf cart (which at times can be quite annoying). Obviously he also is very happy with his.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tylee

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck. Guaranteed not to disappoint
customer_reviews.text: My favorite parts have got to be the construction quality (it’s nice and heavy for its size), sound quality (lives up to it’s name’s sake) and the battery life! The battery life lasts forever! The only draw back is that if you don’t use it, or pause the music, it will shut itself off after about 5 minutes which can me annoying, however it’s jsut a simple push of a button and your back on again. Great speaker, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound easy to carry room to room
customer_reviews.text: Great sound easy to carry room to room. Or side Lobe it in garage. Was useimg the jam boxes big radio and had to find place to put it So it was out of the way this is small enough no more problems. Also great price and bought warranty cause I am useimg it and taking the speaker from kitchen to eating out side love it. If you buy two tthey can both be used at dame time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Regan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little speaker and sounds pretty good, but it just did not have enough power to make it loud enough. If it was louder I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Lytepipe

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch.... finally found a ...
customer_reviews.text: Packs a punch....finally found a small enough but very loud and clear speaker. Having issues when turning it on tho....sometimes I have to push the on button for a long time....and at least 3 times before it turns on and connects, but once it does, works perfectly. Not sure if i am not doing something right. If not for that, it could have gotten all 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ondicho Mobe

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built and have a pretty decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and have a pretty decent sound. One of the better bluetooth speakers i have listened to at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kaizer Soze

customer_reviews.title: I legitimately get compliments on my "car stereo" when it's really just this thing sitting between the windshield and the dash (where it fits like it was made to)
customer_reviews.text: So much louder than expected, I legitimately get compliments on my "car stereo" when it's really just this thing sitting between the windshield and the dash (where it fits like it was made to).
customer_reviews.author: Ftsojic

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for this small price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for this small price. I love this brand anyway but it works perfect for the needs I have for this speaker. Perfect for bonfires or needs I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: A coworker of mine had this in his office and it sounded Awsome! I immediately purchased it and it was delivered in 1 day ! It fills my office with music and everyone thinks is a stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Green

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Easy
customer_reviews.text: Clean, full sound...digging Kraftwerk's "Antenna" through Spotify at the moment. Completely outperforming my vintage setup. If you enjoy rock and or roll via bluetooth & auxiliary, this is worth the price. I bring it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: senator jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for the price. Good sound. Is lacking in bass and can be a little distorted at high volumes. But not enough to loose another star.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous-Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Powerful an Clear Sound
customer_reviews.text: This thing has the power. I was very surprised at the sound this speaker puts out and it fills the room and then some. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: ... heard a lot of Bluetooth speakers and was never satisfied. I heard this had good reviews but was ...
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a lot of Bluetooth speakers and was never satisfied. I heard this had good reviews but was gun shy to buy one without hearing it first. I finally bit the bullet and I am a VERY HAPPY CAMPER! The noise that comes out of this baffles the mind for such a small package. To put it in perspective, I am an audiophile geek that runs vinyl through a Class-A tube amplifier into Klipschorn speakers. These will in no way shape or form replace that but one of the best bluetooth speakers I have ever heard! Go buy one ... NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome, it's got a good amount of bass without sounding totally distorted and the volume level is strong. My only complaint with the speaker is it makes very cheesy sounds when you turn it on, off, and connect media to it. Other than that it does everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Booming sound
customer_reviews.text: Wow great good sound I use it for Bluetooth I’m in a w/c and the sound is booming. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: FLYINGDRAGONRACING52

product_meta.title: Klipsch Groove Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Groove)
product_meta.description: With an 8 hour battery life + Easy USB charging the Klipsch Groove Bluetooth speaker is designed to bring big sound wherever the road takes you. Room filling sound that fits in the palm of your hand has never been more fun or long lasting.
feature_bullets: Crisp, Clear, Non Muffled Sound (hear your music how you want to)
Splash Resistant – Protecting You from the Friend that Spills Everything

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars558 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
